feed.title: InvenTree
feed.subtitle: InvenTree is an open-source inventory management system which provides intuitive parts management and stock control. It is at the center of an ecosystem of addins for EDA tools, API wrapper, deeply integrated plugins and 3rd party tools.

entry.title: 2022 in Review
entry.summary: 2022 was a huge year for the InvenTree project.

entry.title: 0.9.0 Stable Release
entry.summary: The InvenTree team is very excited to announce the InvenTree 0.9.0 Stable Release!

entry.title: Translating InvenTree
entry.summary: How we provide translation support for InvenTree in multiple languages

entry.title: Starting with templates
entry.summary: A good starting-point for developing your own plugin is taking a look at the documentation.
